markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Wild Hunt](/Traits.aspx?ID=435)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 616</row>

Creatures with the wild hunt trait are never below 14th level. They possess [greater darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), greensight, planar acclimation, wild gaze, instinctive cooperation, weakness to [cold iron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=272), the ability to [_speak with plants_](/Spells.aspx?ID=294) and [_animals_](/Spells.aspx?ID=293), and their own specific wild hunt link.
name: Wild Hunt
